articles.title: Watchmaker Swatch apologises for ‘slanted eye’ ad after online backlash in China - CNN
articles.description: Swiss watchmaker Swatch opens new tab has issued an apology and pulled ads featuring images of an Asian male model pulling the corners of his eyes up and backwards in a “slanted eye” pose.
articles.content:
Swiss watchmaker Swatch has issued an apology and pulled ads featuring images of an Asian male model pulling the corners of his eyes up and backwards in a slanted eye pose.
The images for the Swatch… [+1055 chars]
